title: Learning The Game: Lessons With Lecrae
description: Cari Champion talks to rapper Lecrae about his rise in the industry as a Christian artist, being the "best you" and more. Plus, Cari's interns get career and life advice.
itunes:title: Learning The Game: Lessons With Lecrae
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
